name: Hit Dino Trex
description:
Did you know Dino run on Chrome?. The story of Dino run is almost end, he want to save his friend. But you have to stop them, don't let the dino save his friend, it's that happen game will over. The Jumper Dino is very difficult to kill, use the racket when he is on air, you also can use the hammer to kill the runner. You want to kill both of them? Use Pterodactyl.

Just hit the dino, enjoy the game, and collect your best score.
